content: *from the website * this is a gripper towel ring because the towel is inserted between two rings that make it difficult for the towel to slide off the ring you can use holiday buttons and colors to make these for your holiday kitchen they re also handy on garden carts golf carts bbq grills in the laundry room in the garage in the car for camping etc *materials * - worsted weight yarn cotton or acrylic - two 2 lucite rings - 3/4 - 1 button - needle and thread - small towel
